docs.abstract: In my 20s, I made the decision to change, eat differently and add regular exercise to my days, and in two years I lost 40 pounds -- yes, two years.
docs.lead_paragraph: As someone whose career is helping people balance their lives and health, I found the recent Time magazine article, Why Exercise Won't Make You Thin, disheartening and discouraging. With an obesity epidemic in our country and a health care system that focuses on disease versus prevention, this article simply added fuel to the fire.
docs.snippet: In my 20s, I made the decision to change, eat differently and add regular exercise to my days, and in two years I lost 40 pounds -- yes, two years.

headline.main: Obama’s Health Care Town Hall in Portsmouth

docs.lead_paragraph: A text of President Obama’s town-hall meeting in Portsmouth, N.H., where he took answers on his proposal to overhaul health care.

headline.seo: Family of First New York Swine Flu Victim Intends to Sue City
headline.print_headline: First Flu Victim’s Family Intends to Sue City
headline.main: First Flu Victim’s Family Intends to Sue City

docs.lead_paragraph: The wife and sons of Mitchell Wiener, an assistant principal at a Queens school, said they would claim the city was negligent.
docs.snippet: The wife and sons of Mitchell Wiener, an assistant principal at a Queens school, said they would claim the city was negligent.

headline.main: Family of Swine Flu Victim Plans to Sue City

docs.abstract: The family of Mitchell Wiener, a middle school assistant principal, says it will seek damages for pain and suffering, wrongful death, medical expenses and loss of companionship.
docs.lead_paragraph: The wife and three sons of New York City's first fatal swine flu victim, an assistant principal at an intermediate school in Queens, have notified the city that they intend to file a wrongful death and negligence lawsuit against the city.
docs.snippet: The family of Mitchell Wiener, a middle school assistant principal, says it will seek damages for pain and suffering, wrongful death, medical expenses and loss of companionship.

headline.print_headline: Seeking Lessons in Swine Flu Fight
headline.main: Seeking Lessons in Swine Flu Fight
